Mayor Misty Songe Hart

As your mayor, I am honored to serve our great city and its residents. My goal is to ensure our community remains a vibrant, safe, and inclusive place for all. Together with the City Council, city staff, and local leaders, I am working hard to maintain our city's infrastructure, grow the local economy, and improve the quality of life for every citizen.

This page is designed to provide you with important information about the mayor’s role, current initiatives, and how to get involved in city government. Here, you’ll find updates on key projects, announcements of upcoming events, and ways to stay connected with our office. We encourage open communication and welcome your feedback on how we can better serve you.

In partnership with city departments, we’re committed to addressing critical issues such as public safety, affordable housing, transportation, and sustainable development. Our vision is to build a community that thrives both economically and socially, where businesses flourish, and residents feel connected and supported.

Please feel free to reach out to my office if you have any questions, concerns, or ideas. Together, we can continue to make our city an amazing place to live, work, and play.

Mayor Misty Songe Hart
